name: Switch it off and on again
name_original: Switch it off and on again
description:
Switch it off and on again with your friends anywhere in the world! Maybe even switch it off and on again with your neighbors! Maybe with some strangers!
The only requirement is that you don't do it alone!

Controls

Enter - Start

Space - Help

Esc - Cancel/Quit

Up - On

Down - Off

How it works

You will be connected to a server and after a certain time the game will begin. Switch it off and on again until the block has been filled. Don't switch it on and on again or off and off again, because that's not how it works. If you fill the block, you win and your time will be recorded on the leaderboard!

Switch it off and on again as fast as you can, and you might end up on our leaderboard as the fastest Switch it off and on again-er!

This was my submission for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3 and my first ever jam submission.

I wanted to make an online multiplayer mainly so that I could learn how it works in the Godot engine. I spent all of 20 mins on the game concept and about 6 days trying to figure out how to build an online multiplayer.
